original_text: Before you start to attack a city, you must offer peace to the people who live there. Tell them what they must do to stop you attacking them.
korean_text: 네가 어떤 성읍으로 나아가서 치려 할 때에는 그 성읍에 먼저 화평을 선언하라

sentences.original_text: Before you start to attack a city,
you must offer peace to the people
Tell them what they must do
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 무엇을 해야 하는지 그들에게 말하세요
당신이 그들을 공격하는 것을 막기 위해.
